documents.document: @steambelle In context, this comes across as though you're trying to invalidate how I understand my own experience.
@steambelle I don't understand what your point is supposed to be though. Like are you trying to say I'm WRONG, that *I* didn't choose?
Fuck this nonsense. I'm out.
"I experienced X" "Well, for me, I experienced Y" "So?" "It's just I experienced Y" "Okay..." "I experienced Y, my feelings were very Y" "…"
The way some trans people just absolutely REFUSE to allow you to articulate an experience different than their own....
@steambelle YOUR transition is not MY transition. MY experience does not have to mirror YOURS.
@steambelle WHAT. DOES. THAT. HAVE. TO. DO. WITH. WHAT. I. SAID.
@ArtistGenn Dense. Wet. Extremely poverty overlapping with extreme wealth. New- lots of condo towers. Large Asian community. I dunno?
@steambelle Okayyyy... but again, what does this have to do with anything I'm saying???
I'm not in a good mood right now so think carefully about what kind of nonsense you want to put in my mentions.
@steambelle Good for you. The fuck does that have to do with me and my experience?!?

"first time the word transgender has been said onstage at the superbowl!"
WHO GIVE A SHIT
Which is to say, we've all been rah rah rah Teen Vogue and all, but Phillip Picardi is shallow consumerist sheltered no-perspective garbage.
That guy, Phillip Picardi, is the same fuck who was also acting like BRANDS need unity and togetherness in this time of need earlier today.
The appalling joke of this guy acting like he's the expert on LGBTQ attitudes towards that song while ignorant of t… https://t.co/eh9XOCuX6w

And while I'm on the clusterfuck of "Born This Way", I'd ALSO like to remind you that "This Land Is Your Land" is Colonial Settler Bullshit.
@hayleyglyphs Popular does not mean unquestioned or uncritiqued. Also kids are kids. They've got different needs/priorities.
If you think that's some fucked up blasphemy or are terrified of what that might "imply", that is very very VERY much YOUR problem.

I was not born trans. I became trans when I CHOSE to transition.

@alexandraerin @RaeBeta …different consumer preferences, and I'm not sure any of the three really serves us.
@alexandraerin @RaeBeta …really just says a lot more about you than about the situation. The media is providing different narratives for…
@alexandraerin @RaeBeta Whether you're seeing them as blundering baffoons, villainous puppetmasters or tough practical decisive leaders…
@alexandraerin @RaeBeta I think it can just lend them a different mystique that helps anyway. Much like the "Bannon Great Manipulator" does.
@TBonvillain But look at his little hood. I wonder if his mom knit it for him.
@alexandraerin @RaeBeta …gained from following along with the soap opera of which fascist hates which fascist?
@alexandraerin @RaeBeta …paying attention - help? Like, aside from maybe spotting weak links and putting extra pressure there, what's to be…
@alexandraerin @RaeBeta But... how? How do salacious details of the tensions within the ranks - that are already well apparent to anyone…
@ksej EXACTLY like with "alternative medicine". Works great if there's nothing actually wrong with you and you just need a placebo and time.
@ksej No, it's still crap. I think it only works if you didn't ACTUALLY have any real problems in the first place.
